definitions.usage_example: She is confident about the presentation.
definitions.usage_example_es: Ella está segura de la presentación.
definitions.usage_context_en: Feeling or showing self-assurance and certainty.
definitions.usage_context_es: Sentir o mostrar seguridad en uno mismo y certeza.

definitions.usage_example: He is a reliable employee.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él es un empleado confiable.
definitions.usage_context_en: Consistently good in quality or performance; trustworthy.
definitions.usage_context_es: Consistentemente bueno en calidad o desempeño; digno de confianza.

definitions.usage_example: Please be honest with me.
definitions.usage_example_es: Por favor, sé honesto conmigo.
definitions.usage_context_en: Truthful and sincere; not lying or cheating.
definitions.usage_context_es: Veraz y sincero; que no miente ni engaña.

definitions.usage_example: You are responsible for this task.
definitions.usage_example_es: Tú eres responsable de esta tarea.
definitions.usage_context_en: Having a duty to deal with something; accountable.
definitions.usage_context_es: Tener el deber de lidiar con algo; ser responsable.

definitions.usage_example: He is a very independent person.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él es una persona muy independiente.
definitions.usage_context_en: Not depending on another for help or money.
definitions.usage_context_es: Que no depende de otro para ayuda o dinero.

definitions.usage_example: The artist is very creative.
definitions.usage_example_es: El artista es muy creativo.
definitions.usage_context_en: Involving imagination or original ideas.
definitions.usage_context_es: Que involucra imaginación o ideas originales.

definitions.usage_example: Thank you, that is very generous.
definitions.usage_example_es: Gracias, eso es muy generoso.
definitions.usage_context_en: Willing to give more money, help, or time than is usual or expected.
definitions.usage_context_es: Dispuesto a dar más dinero, ayuda o tiempo de lo habitual o esperado.

definitions.usage_example: Don't be selfish, share your toys.
definitions.usage_example_es: No seas egoísta, comparte tus juguetes.
definitions.usage_context_en: Lacking consideration for others; concerned chiefly with one's own profit or pleasure.
definitions.usage_context_es: Falto de consideración por los demás; preocupado principalmente por el beneficio o placer propio.

definitions.usage_example: She is an ambitious student.
definitions.usage_example_es: Ella es una estudiante ambiciosa.
definitions.usage_context_en: Having or showing a strong desire and determination to succeed.
definitions.usage_context_es: Tener o mostrar un fuerte deseo y determinación para triunfar.

definitions.usage_example: Her desk is always organized.
definitions.usage_example_es: Su escritorio está siempre organizado.
definitions.usage_context_en: Arranged or structured in a systematic way.
definitions.usage_context_es: Arreglado o estructurado de forma sistemática.

definitions.usage_example: He is very sensitive to criticism.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él es muy sensible a las críticas.
definitions.usage_context_en: Quick to detect or respond to slight changes; easily hurt or offended.
definitions.usage_context_es: Rápido para detectar o responder a pequeños cambios; fácil de herir u ofender.

definitions.usage_example: That is a sensible decision.
definitions.usage_example_es: Esa es una decisión sensata.
definitions.usage_context_en: Having or showing common sense and good judgment; practical.
definitions.usage_context_es: Tener o mostrar sentido común y buen juicio; práctico.

definitions.usage_example: She is a hardworking employee.
definitions.usage_example_es: Ella es una empleada trabajadora.
definitions.usage_context_en: Tending to work with energy and commitment.
definitions.usage_context_es: Que tiende a trabajar con energía y compromiso.

definitions.usage_example: Please be careful with the glass.
definitions.usage_example_es: Por favor, sé cuidadoso con el vaso.
definitions.usage_context_en: Making sure to avoid potential danger, harm, or mistakes.
definitions.usage_context_es: Asegurarse de evitar peligros, daños o errores potenciales.

definitions.usage_example: I feel relaxed after the vacation.
definitions.usage_example_es: Me siento relajado después de las vacaciones.
definitions.usage_context_en: Free from tension and anxiety.
definitions.usage_context_es: Libre de tensión y ansiedad.

definitions.usage_example: He is worried about the test.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él está preocupado por el examen.
definitions.usage_context_en: Feeling or showing anxiety about actual or potential problems.
definitions.usage_context_es: Sentir o mostrar ansiedad por problemas reales o potenciales.

definitions.usage_example: I was surprised by the news.
definitions.usage_example_es: Me sorprendieron las noticias.
definitions.usage_context_en: Feeling or showing mild shock or astonishment.
definitions.usage_context_es: Sentir o mostrar un leve shock o asombro.

definitions.usage_example: She was disappointed with her grade.
definitions.usage_example_es: Ella estaba decepcionada con su nota.
definitions.usage_context_en: Sad or displeased because someone or something has failed to fulfill one's hopes or expectations.
definitions.usage_context_es: Triste o disgustado porque alguien o algo no ha cumplido las esperanzas o expectativas.

definitions.usage_example: I am confused by the instructions.
definitions.usage_example_es: Estoy confundido por las instrucciones.
definitions.usage_context_en: Unable to think clearly or to understand something.
definitions.usage_context_es: Incapaz de pensar con claridad o de entender algo.

definitions.usage_example: The cat is curious about the box.
definitions.usage_example_es: El gato tiene curiosidad por la caja.
definitions.usage_context_en: Eager to know or learn something.
definitions.usage_context_es: Ansioso por saber o aprender algo.

definitions.usage_example: You are lucky to win.
definitions.usage_example_es: Eres afortunado de ganar.
definitions.usage_context_en: Having, bringing, or resulting from good luck.
definitions.usage_context_es: Tener, traer o resultar de la buena suerte.

definitions.usage_example: He was unlucky in the game.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él tuvo mala suerte en el juego.
definitions.usage_context_en: Having, bringing, or resulting from bad luck.
definitions.usage_context_es: Tener, traer o resultar de la mala suerte.

definitions.usage_example: The child is afraid of the dark.
definitions.usage_example_es: El niño le tiene miedo a la oscuridad.
definitions.usage_context_en: Feeling fear or anxiety; frightened.
definitions.usage_context_es: Sentir miedo o ansiedad; asustado.

definitions.usage_example: I am interested in history.
definitions.usage_example_es: Estoy interesado en la historia.
definitions.usage_context_en: Showing curiosity or concern about something or someone.
definitions.usage_context_es: Mostrar curiosidad o preocupación por algo o alguien.

definitions.usage_example: That was a thoughtful gift.
definitions.usage_example_es: Ese fue un regalo muy considerado.
definitions.usage_context_en: Showing consideration for the needs of other people.
definitions.usage_context_es: Mostrar consideración por las necesidades de otras personas.

definitions.usage_example: Why are you so serious?
definitions.usage_example_es: ¿Por qué estás tan serio?
definitions.usage_context_en: Not joking or lighthearted; thoughtful.
definitions.usage_context_es: Que no bromea o es alegre; pensativo.

definitions.usage_example: This is a serious problem.
definitions.usage_example_es: Este es un problema grave.
definitions.usage_context_en: Important; demanding consideration; not trivial.
definitions.usage_context_es: Importante; que exige consideración; no trivial.

definitions.usage_example: The teacher is patient with the students.
definitions.usage_example_es: La profesora es paciente con los estudiantes.
definitions.usage_context_en: Able to accept or tolerate delays or problems without becoming annoyed or anxious.
definitions.usage_context_es: Capaz de aceptar o tolerar retrasos o problemas sin molestarse o ponerse ansioso.

definitions.usage_example: The shy child hid behind his mother.
definitions.usage_example_es: El niño tímido se escondió detrás de su madre.
definitions.usage_context_en: Being nervous or timid in the company of other people.
definitions.usage_context_es: Estar nervioso o tímido en compañía de otras personas.

definitions.usage_example: I am proud of your work.
definitions.usage_example_es: Estoy orgulloso de tu trabajo.
definitions.usage_context_en: Feeling deep pleasure or satisfaction as a result of one's own achievements or qualities.
definitions.usage_context_es: Sentir profundo placer o satisfacción como resultado de los propios logros o cualidades.

definitions.usage_example: He was embarrassed by his mistake.
definitions.usage_example_es: Estaba avergonzado por su error.
definitions.usage_context_en: Feeling awkward, self-conscious, or ashamed.
definitions.usage_context_es: Sentirse incómodo, cohibido o avergonzado.

definitions.usage_example: She was annoyed by the noise.
definitions.usage_example_es: Ella estaba molesta por el ruido.
definitions.usage_context_en: Slightly angry; irritated.
definitions.usage_context_es: Ligeramente enojado; irritado.

definitions.usage_example: He is upset about the bad news.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él está molesto por las malas noticias.
definitions.usage_context_en: Unhappy, disappointed, or worried.
definitions.usage_context_es: Infeliz, decepcionado o preocupado.
